mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_MNG ( USER_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NM, USER_PW_ENC, BIRTH_ENC, TEL_NUM_ENC, EMAIL, DEPT_NM, REG_DT, REG_ID, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, GENDER, BLOOD_TYPE, USER_PROFILE ) VALUES ( NEXTVAL('USER_MNG_SEQ'), #{userId}, #{userNm}, #{userPwEnc}, #{birthEnc}, #{telNumEnc}, #{email}, #{deptNm}, NOW(), #{userId}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{gender}, #{bloodType}, #{imgFileName} )
